thread.title: UPDATE: Motorway blocked by overturned caravan
thread.title_full: UPDATE: Motorway blocked by overturned caravan

title: UPDATE: Motorway blocked by overturned caravan
text:
5 comments 
AN overturned caravan is causing delays for people travelling on a busy Hampshire motorway this afternoon. 
The vehicle is currently blocking two lanes of the M3 northbound between junctions ten and nine for Winchester . Share article 
It means long delays are building up on the northbound carriageway while emergency services make their way to the scene to clear the vehicle off the motorway. 
Drivers face delays of around 30 minutes currently on approach from junction 12. Promoted Stories UPDATE: Motorway blocked by overturned caravan   MIKESOTON 4:10pm Fri 11 Sep 15 
It's a caravan and it's taking up the middle and fast lane. I past it on the opposite side about 15 mins ago. It's a caravan and it's taking up the middle and fast lane. I past it on the opposite side about 15 mins ago. MIKESOTON 
It's a caravan and it's taking up the middle and fast lane. I past it on the opposite side about 15 mins ago. Report
